jcr:content.jcr:description: Our best-selling road shoe just got better with a redesigned tongue, extra cushion, and a molded heel collar. The new Torin 7 is engineered for any run!
jcr:content.jcr:title: Torin 7

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Engineered for any run.


Every detail in the new Torin 7 is engineered for every run, with a redesigned tongue and heel collar, plus more cushion.

customhtml2_copy_669.customHTML: Shop Men Shop Women

customhtml2_copy_cop_610336964.customHTML:
Level up


This workhorse road shoe features our plushest Altra EGO™ MAX foam, designed for performance and durability. Plus, we’ve added two more millimeters of cushion for extra bounce and comfort.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Feel the fit


An evolved molded heel collar helps keeps your foot locked in and secure with every stride. This redesigned heel provides comfort and fit without holding you back. With our Standard FootShape™ Fit, your feet have the space they need to move naturally.

customhtml2_copy_cop_929668198.customHTML:
A fine redesign


The new Torin 7 is equipped with a completely redesigned tongue for a plush feel. A lightweight engineered mesh upper offers comfort and breathability so you can feel easy breezy, no matter where your run takes you.

video.description: Sizzle reel for the new Torin 7
video.name: Torin 7

customhtml2_copy_669_1957727180.customHTML: Shop Men Shop Women

customhtml2_copy_cop_228578415.customHTML:
We gave Philly-based ISSA Run Crew a sneak peak of the new Torin 7.

Here's what they had to say!

content.subheadingContent: "The new Torin 7 is really good for long runs. I love the extra space in the toe box and I've noticed less blisters and foot problems since wearing them."
"It's super comfortable, right out of the box and gave me enough support. Good for some easy miles."
"These are perfect for recovery day, shakeout run, or something where you want a soft ride. They're nice and cushy for your legs."
